BasicInfo.short: Alminder is focused on developing Mynd Calendar, an intelligent mobile calendar app for iPhones and other iOS devices.

Products.name: Mynd Calendar
Products.description: Mynd Calendar is a smart calendar application that packs a virtual assistant on an iOS platform.
